FREE RENT=NO FEE! ABSOLUTELY MUST SEE ASAP! Beautiful 1 Bedroom in an Elevator/Laundry building. Spacious naturally lit living room with wall of windows, separate kitchen and full bathroom. Large bedroom will happily accommodate a Queen plus. Strip wood floors and great closet space. Right down the block to the Q train.

PLEASE CONTACT MURPHY FOR ADDITIONAL DETAILS AND ARRANGE A TIME TO CHECK OUT THIS BEAUTY - CALL 917-691-4045 with ID # 496570
